inputs.label: Enter the new formula command (must begin with 'vkpr'):
inputs.name: vkpr_formula
inputs.tutorial: Formula must have the form 'vkpr + object + verb + name'

inputs.label: Enter workspace path (leave empty for current working dir):
inputs.name: vkpr_workspace_path
inputs.tutorial: You can list available workspaces with `rit list workspace`

inputs.label: Enter formula path (leave empty for best guess):
inputs.name: vkpr_formula_path
inputs.tutorial: If formula is 'vkpr object verb' then its path is '/vkpr/object/verb'
